thumb.title: 逃避 Escape 【BGM】
thumb.description: この音楽は、聴く人を恐ろしい幻想の世界へと誘う暗いメロディーを展開します。心の奥にひそむ不安な感情がほのかに顔を出し、聴く人を不気味な旅へ導いていきます。重厚かつ不穏な音色が織り成す音景の中で、聴く人は暗闇に潜む恐怖と魅惑の狭間を行き来する貴重な体験ができるでしょう。深淵に潜む恐ろしい雰囲気が全体を包み込み、聴く人の心に長く残る印象を与える音楽体験が待っています！ This music unfolds a dark melody that draws listeners into a terrifying fantasy world. The uneasy emotions lurking deep within the heart faintly emerge, guiding listeners on an eerie journey. Within the soundscape woven from heavy and unsettling tones, listeners will experience the rare opportunity to navigate the narrow space between fear and fascination lurking in the darkness. The terrifying atmosphere shrouding the depths envelops the entire piece, offering a musical experience that leaves a lasting impression on the listener's heart! https://twitter.com/nojisuman2525 download https://nojimusic.base.shop https://www.motionelements.com/ja/artists/nojisuma https://patreon.com/NojiSuma?utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator&utm_content=join_lin
